items.title: Hochul, Van Hollen back Zohran Mamdani as senator slams ‘spineless’ Democrats
items.description: Sen. Chris Van Hollen of Maryland says Democratic leaders need to line up behind Zohran Mamdani’s New York mayoral bid if the party wants to win elect...

items.title: Republican Rep. Michael McCaul of Texas will not seek reelection
items.description: The longtime lawmaker, who has at times disagreed with Trump on foreign policy, has been a supporter of Ukraine in its war against Russia.

items.title: Trump’s unpredictable Guard deployments send big-city mayors scrambling
items.description: Democratic mayors are laboring to stay prepared and unified as Trump weighs federal incursions that could upend their communities and political career...

items.title: Charlie Kirk’s killing and its aftermath are symptoms of a fragile democracy
items.description: Rising politically motivated violence is an “attack on the American experiment,” cautioned Utah Gov. Spencer Cox.
